library.name: FileIO
library.description: Provides basic functions for interacting with the local file system.

value.name: UTF8
value.description: The UTF-8 encoding without a Byte-Order-Mark.

value.name: UTF8_BOM
value.description: The UTF-8 encoding with the Byte-Order-Mark.

function.name: pathJoin
function.description: Joins a list of strings with the platform's default path delimiter.

function.name: pathExists
function.description: Checks to see if a path exists (either a file or a directory).

function.name: fileExists

returns.description: True if the path exists and is a file (not a directory).

function.description: Checks to see if a file exists.

function.name: directoryExists

returns.description: True if the path exists and is a directory (not a file).

function.description: Checks to see if a directory exists.

arg.name: content
arg.description: content to write to a file as a string

function.name: fileReadText
function.description: Returns the file contents as a string

function.name: fileReadLines

returns.description: List of lines in the file

function.description: Returns a list of lines in the file as a list of strings

function.name: fileReadBytes
function.description: Returns a list of bytes in the file. These are unsigned numbers from 0 to 255.

function.name: fileWriteBytes
function.description: Writes binary content to a file. Input must be a list of byte values that are either signed or unsigned.

function.name: fileMove

arg.name: pathFrom
arg.description: an absolute or relative path of the original file location

arg.name: pathTo
arg.description: an absolute or relative path of the new file location

arg.name: allowOverwrite
arg.description: true if overwriting existing files is okay

function.description: Moves a file from one location to a new one. Optionally allows overwriting files.

function.name: fileCopy

arg.name: pathFrom
arg.description: an absolute or relative path of the original file location

arg.name: pathTo
arg.description: an absolute or relative path of the new file location

arg.name: allowOverwrite
arg.description: true if overwriting existing files is okay

function.description: Copies a file to a new location. Optionally allows overwriting files.

function.name: directoryList

arg.name: includeFullPath
arg.description: true if absolute file paths should be returned. Otherwise, file names only are returned.

function.description: Returns a list of files and subdirectories in a given directory

arg.name: path
arg.description: an absolute or relative path to create

arg.name: makeParents
arg.description: true if parent directories should be created if already not present

arg.name: path
arg.description: an absolute or relative path of a directory to delete

function.name: directoryMove

arg.name: pathFrom
arg.description: an absolute or relative path of a directory to move

arg.name: pathTo
arg.description: an absolute or relative path of a location to move a directory to

function.description: Moves a directory and its contents to a new location.

function.name: currentDirectory
function.description: Returns the current directory that the app is running in.
